author: Kayla Epstein
title: TV networks cut away from the White House coronavirus briefing as Trump contradicted his health experts
description: CNN, MSNBC, ABC News, NBC News, and CBS News cut away from President Trump's lengthy coronavirus briefing on Monday night. During the briefing, Trump chafed at the idea of continuing the widespread order for people to stay home, which is harming the economy, …
content:
On Monday night, most of the major television networks, with the exception of Fox News, cut away from President Donald Trump's daily coronavirus briefing.
Though the briefings often feature a rotating cast of administration health experts like Director of th… [+4471 chars]
